title: Fruit and nut bread
ingredients: ['400 g (14 oz) strong white (bread) flour', '½ tsp salt', 'grated zest of ½ lemon', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast, about 7 g', '85 g (3 oz) ready-to-eat dried apricots, roughly chopped', '85 g (3 oz) ready-to-eat dried pears, roughly chopped', '85 g (3 oz) stoned ready-to-eat prunes, roughly chopped', '50 g (1¼ oz) ready-to-eat dried figs, roughly chopped', '50 g (1¼ oz) chopped mixed nuts, such as almonds, hazelnuts and cashews', '250 ml (8½ fl oz) tepid water']
